mapper.select: SELECT b.id,b.user_id,b.title,b.content,b.author,b.type_id,(SELECT COUNT(id) as count FROM tbl_like_management WHERE board_id = b.id) as count, b.photo_path, b.time FROM tbl_board b ORDER BY b.time desc

SELECT b.id,b.user_id,b.title,b.content,b.author,b.type_id,(SELECT COUNT(id) as count FROM tbl_like_management WHERE board_id = b.id) as count, b.photo_path, b.time FROM tbl_board b WHERE type_id = #{typeId} ORDER BY b.time desc

SELECT c.id,c.board_id,c.user_id,c.parent,c.comment,c.dept,c.seq,u.nickname FROM tbl_comment c LEFT OUTER JOIN tbl_user u ON c.user_id = u.id WHERE c.board_id = #{id} ORDER BY IF(ISNULL(c.parent), c.id, c.parent), c.seq
